metadata.title: CVE-2021-3943 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Moodle in versions 3.11 to 3.11.3, 3.10 to 3.10.7, 3.9to 3.9.10 and earlier unsupported versions. A remote code execution riskwhen restoring backup files was identified.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
